name: ext_R4_CareTeam
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.CareTeam for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents CareTeam from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CareTeam|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R2.

element.short: Planned participants in the coordination and delivery of care for a patient or group
element.definition: The Care Team includes all the people and organizations who plan to participate in the coordination and delivery of care for a patient.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).
